column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=This weekend , I planned to go bike riding .
#text=I had n't gone in some time and , when I checked my bike beforehand , discovered that one of the tires had gone flat .
#text=I attempted to pump air back into the tire , first .
#text=The tire would not hold air , so I knew that I would have to repair the flat tire .
#text=This would help me by giving me better access to the bike tires .
#text=I found a wrench of appropriate size and used it to take off the bolts that held the tire on the bike .
#text=When I had taken off the bolts , I took the tire off the bike frame .
#text=Then , I let out the rest of the air out of the bike tire .
#text=When the tire was completely flat , I carefully took the rubber tire off the metal bike spoke frame .
#text=The inside of a bike tire is hollow and houses the tire tube .
#text=I knew that the bike tire was probably flat because of a puncture in the bike tube , so I checked that first .
#text=Sure enough , there was a large hole in my bike tire tube .
#text=I had a small bike tire repair kit in my garage and went to get it .
#text=I returned with it and took out the rubber patch that I would use to repair the tube .
#text=I prepared the tube and then applied a rubber patch to the puncture with a bit of glue .
#text=I then tested the bike tire tube and found that the patch was working .
#text=So , I replaced the tube and the outer tire on the metal spokes .
#text=Then , I put the tire back on the bike frame and tightened the bolts that would hold it there .
#text=Finally , I put the bike right-side up and filled the tire with air .
#text=I knew this weekend would be fun .
